@UNILAD #ladbible #unilad https://t.co/JHzlWJTl2S

#HalfOfMe officially makes 20 number ones in 10 years. This milestone occurring on a week of gratitude couldn't be more fitting. There's so much to be thankful for this year. I'm just absolutely humbled & floored. And I have a feeling the next decade is going to be even better 🙌 https://t.co/5FsjuMHe9Y

data.text:
The #WhereWeStarted music video will be here at 10am CT on Tuesday, 10.18.22. Who’s ready? @katyperry 
Set a reminder for the premiere: https://t.co/iKSCvVvwwS https://t.co/vcE8p3TWg5

To my band and crew, you all are top notch professionals. Y’all are also my family. Thank y’all for everything! To all the fans that came out. Wow is all I got. Every single night y’all brought so much energy and joy to these buildings🙌 till next year fam! https://t.co/ToSFb06Pwd

The “bring the bar to you” tour officially wrapped last night in Dayton, OH. It has been such an amazing summer/fall out with this crew! @ParkerMcCollum and @ConnerVSmith when y’all are headlining stadiums one day, don’t forget to bring the Ole man (me) along! Haha love y’all! https://t.co/ECXb3vq6cz
Thank you so much Evansville, IN for such a special night! Really hope y’all felt as much joy as we did on stage 🙌 it truly was the 14th of October https://t.co/yreEmgGMRj
Thank you moline, IL! Yall were incredible https://t.co/wGxUX8pyp0
It was the 14th of October

RT @katyperry: 10.18.22 
@ThomasRhett https://t.co/GPAQ1NjRRH

10.18.22
@katyperry https://t.co/OUAz6YF9jf

10 years with my best friend🙌 @laur_akins I legit don’t know sometimes if you are a real person or an Angel. I could not a dreamed up a better life if I tried. 10 years and 4 kids later I love you more every single day. I love you so much! Happy anniversary babe❤️ https://t.co/GfgjGTEZ6b
One day in on our two night anniversary getaway. Tacos at 11:30 AM😂 https://t.co/ofZckcArZV
Thank you Missoula, MT! https://t.co/1N1zMSqKMB

data.text: Celebrating #CountryMusicMonth with my friends at @amazonmusic. Y’all go check out a brand new acoustic version of #HalfOfMe (feat. @RileyGreenMusic) over on #AmazonMusic: https://t.co/2440bqXr5R 🍻 #WeAreCountry https://t.co/sm6hUYdQKn
This day will go down in the memory books. Sold out show in Bozeman, MT. Montana mallards this morning. Missoula, MT to finish out the weekend! See y’all tonight🙌 https://t.co/GUnTgbfg28
Nampa, ID last night was on a different level! On a Thursday! Love y’all. Bozeman, MT you’re up tonight💥let’s get it https://t.co/4xMMrCHXOc
Sold out in Sioux Falls, SD! What a night.. wow 📸 Spencer Combs https://t.co/txxHXVcA8A
Bismark, ND! 📸 Spencer Combs https://t.co/bbUW2nX4RE

data.text: Hard to believe the final month of the US #bringthebartoyoutour is here. Y’all come out and rock with us 🤘 Get tickets: https://t.co/Zmn0KZKpdj https://t.co/MWJSJ9Np0A

TR, how was Grand Forks last night? https://t.co/CtnFYzsVpO

I have been pretty freaked out by horses most of my life.  @laur_akins on the other hand grew up around them and now so have our kids. Therefore, I need to get more comfortable around them. Today was the closest I’ve really been to a horse in my adult years and it was incredible. https://t.co/qpVBQyQkvb
Thank you Tulsa 🙌 📸 Grayson Gregory https://t.co/v8iWV8MxL6

Can’t get over how awesome last night was. Thank you Springfield, MO.

tweets.text:
WATCH: @ThomasRhett and @katyperry have released the official music video for their duet, "Where We Started."
https://t.co/tVwzp5UpdH

urls.title: Thomas Rhett & Katy Perry • "Where We Started"
urls.description: Click here to watch the video!

tweets.text: A little ☁️ dream ☁️ of a music video with @ThomasRhett - watch WHERE WE STARTED https://t.co/0tj7g3xCbg https://t.co/QPhCBoDOd6

urls.title: Thomas Rhett & Katy Perry • "Where We Started"
urls.description: Click here to watch the video!

tweets.text: 🎶 world wait for us 🎶… until Tuesday for the premiere of the WHERE WE STARTED music video. YouTube watch page is live now! https://t.co/0tj7g3xCbg https://t.co/QYr88zkBaC

The “bring the bar to you” tour officially wrapped last night in Dayton, OH. It has been such an amazing summer/fall out with this crew! @ParkerMcCollum and @ConnerVSmith when y’all are headlining stadiums one day, don’t forget to bring the Ole man (me) along! Haha love y’all! https://t.co/ECXb3vq6cz

10.18.22 
@ThomasRhett https://t.co/GPAQ1NjRRH

urls.title: We Apologize For The Interruption
urls.description: Company logo We are currently experiencing technical difficulties and our team is working to resolve this as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience. Please check back soon to continue.

tweets.text:
We are ready to feel Country Again in ONE WEEK with @ThomasRhett! 🎟️: https://t.co/3cXNr4sn9A. 

Also, don’t forget to #ROCKTHEBLOCK with @QuikTrip before the concert! Live music will begin at 4:30PM with Mallory Eagle, followed by a performance from @catieofferman. #Tulsa https://t.co/7QC6eqt2n6

tweets.text: VOTING IS OPEN & We're in 12th place! We need YOU! Valdosta is in the running to help bring free, live music to the Turner Center. Vote for us to become a #LevittAMP finalist. Vote at https://t.co/NFcOho07Zg or text VALDOSTA to 866-267-2023.  PLEASE SHARE!  Voting ends 9/21/22. https://t.co/7aiwF3KhB0
